title: Dragon snowballing.
body:
The most powerful buff from dragon is the first +8% Ap and AD buff. Yes, that's a large bonus. Yes, it scales HARD. 

But you only need one dragon to get that buff.  If your team is so bad that you can't control ONE dragon in the first 25 minutes, you deserve to lose.

replies.body: 5th is by far the strongest. but 4th is a close 2nd.

They are nerfing dragon in the next patch. Reduced to bonus 6% and the "powers" are ordered differently.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/11/1125-pbe-update.html#8

Dragon Slayer Buff

The Dragon Slayer buff has received a few changes
Dragon's Might has been reduced to 6% from 8%
+15% damage to towers and buildings is now granted at  two stacks instead of four. 
 +15% damage to minions and monsters is now granted at four stacks instead of two.
